an5.148:1.3: Saddhaya danam deti, sakkaccam danam deti, kalena danam deti, anuggahitacitto danam deti, attananca paranca anupahacca danam deti.
an5.148:2.1: Saddhaya kho pana, bhikkhave, danam datva yattha yattha tassa danassa vipako nibbattati, addho ca hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo, abhirupo ca hoti dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato.
an5.148:3.1: Sakkaccam kho pana, bhikkhave, danam datva yattha yattha tassa danassa vipako nibbattati, addho ca hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo.
an5.148:3.2: Yepissa te honti puttati va darati va dasati va pessati va kammakarati va, tepi sussusanti sotam odahanti anna cittam upatthapenti.
an5.148:4.1: Kalena kho pana, bhikkhave, danam datva yattha yattha tassa danassa vipako nibbattati, addho ca hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo;
an5.148:5.1: Anuggahitacitto kho pana, bhikkhave, danam datva yattha yattha tassa danassa vipako nibbattati, addho ca hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo;
an5.148:5.2: ularesu ca pancasu kamagunesu bhogaya cittam namati.
an5.148:6.1: Attananca paranca anupahacca kho pana, bhikkhave, danam datva yattha yattha tassa danassa vipako nibbattati, addho ca hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo;
an5.148:6.2: na cassa kutoci bhoganam upaghato agacchati aggito va udakato va rajato va corato va appiyato va dayadato.
